price: 18. Ba Aad, baboyaki kondimela (bantoma na bango), boye etumbu na makebisi na ngai ezalaki boni?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
